metadata.Description: Summary of energy in crisis settings.

entities: sendai framework for disaster risk reduction

level 1.Description: Energy in crisis settings addresses the urgent humanitarian needs of affected populations by providing access to reliable and sustainable energy sources.
Energy in crisis settings employs renewable energy technologies to ensure energy availability in emergency situations and promote resilience.
Energy in crisis settings collaborates with humanitarian organizations to coordinate energy interventions and meet the energy needs of affected populations.
Energy in crisis settings supports disaster response efforts by providing energy solutions for emergency shelters, healthcare facilities, and other critical infrastructure.
Energy in crisis settings administers energy aid programs to ensure the efficient and effective delivery of energy assistance in emergency situations.
Energy in crisis settings measures the resilience of energy systems in crisis settings to identify vulnerabilities and improve preparedness.

level 1.Object: sendai framework for disaster risk reduction
level 1.Description: Energy in crisis settings aligns with the principles and goals of the Sendai Framework for Disaster Risk Reduction to enhance resilience and reduce disaster risks.
Energy in crisis settings is an instance of emergency energy provision, which aims to meet the energy needs of populations affected by crises and disasters.

level 2.Subject: renewable energy agencies
level 2.Description: Renewable energy agencies employ experts in the field of renewable energy to drive innovation and promote the adoption of clean energy technologies.

level 2.Subject: renewable energy agencies
level 2.Description: Renewable energy agencies collaborate with research institutions to advance scientific knowledge and develop new technologies for renewable energy generation.

level 2.Subject: renewable energy agencies
level 2.Description: Renewable energy agencies administer feed-in tariff programs to incentivize the production of renewable energy and promote its integration into the grid.

level 2.Subject: renewable energy agencies
level 2.Description: Renewable energy agencies align their activities and initiatives with the Sustainable Development Goals to contribute to the global agenda for sustainable development.

level 2.Subject: renewable energy agencies
level 2.Description: Renewable energy agencies are government agencies dedicated to promoting and supporting the development of renewable energy sources.

level 3.Subject: renewable energy agencies
level 3.Description: Renewable energy agencies employ experts in the field of renewable energy to drive innovation and promote the adoption of clean energy technologies.
